mapper.select: SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, OVERHAUL_DATE AS overhaulDate, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, TERMINAL_INSIDE_CLEANING AS terminalInsideCleaning, TERMINAL_CLEANING AS terminalCleaning, INTERCOM_CLEANING AS intercomCleaning, FLOAR_CLEANING AS floarCleaning, GARBAGECAN_CLEANING AS garbagecanCleaning, GLASS_CLEAN_CONFIRM AS glassCleanConfirm, PORTFOLIO_PAPER AS portfolioPaper, JRNL_PAPER AS jrnlPaper, BNKB_RIBBON AS bnkbRibbon, NOTICEGUIDE AS noticeguide, ETC_NOTICE AS etcNotice, INTERCOM AS intercom, DVR AS dvr, FLUORESCENT_LIGHT AS fluorescentLight, COOLER AS cooler, HEATER AS heater, BOOTH_OVERHAUL AS boothOverhaul, CHECK_RESIDUAL_QUANTITY AS checkResidualQuantity, RTRVL_BOX AS rtrvlBox, BILLBOARD_LIGHTING AS billboardLighting, UNUSL AS unusl, REPORT_EMP AS reportEmp, OFFICE_NAME AS officeName, TAKE_PHOTO_ENABLE AS takePhotoEnable FROM ATMS_05001110

SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, OVERHAUL_DATE AS overhaulDate, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, TERMINAL_INSIDE_CLEANING AS terminalInsideCleaning, TERMINAL_CLEANING AS terminalCleaning, INTERCOM_CLEANING AS intercomCleaning, FLOAR_CLEANING AS floarCleaning, GARBAGECAN_CLEANING AS garbagecanCleaning, GLASS_CLEAN_CONFIRM AS glassCleanConfirm, PORTFOLIO_PAPER AS portfolioPaper, JRNL_PAPER AS jrnlPaper, BNKB_RIBBON AS bnkbRibbon, NOTICEGUIDE AS noticeguide, ETC_NOTICE AS etcNotice, INTERCOM AS intercom, DVR AS dvr, FLUORESCENT_LIGHT AS fluorescentLight, COOLER AS cooler, HEATER AS heater, BOOTH_OVERHAUL AS boothOverhaul, CHECK_RESIDUAL_QUANTITY AS checkResidualQuantity, RTRVL_BOX AS rtrvlBox, BILLBOARD_LIGHTING AS billboardLighting, UNUSL AS unusl, REPORT_EMP AS reportEmp, OFFICE_NAME AS officeName, TAKE_PHOTO_ENABLE AS takePhotoEnable FROM ATMS_05001110 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, OVERHAUL_DATE = #{overhaulDate}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_05001110 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, OVERHAUL_DATE = #{overhaulDate}

UPDATE ATMS_05001110 SET JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, CORNER_NAME = #{cornerName}, TERMINAL_INSIDE_CLEANING = #{terminalInsideCleaning}, TERMINAL_CLEANING = #{terminalCleaning}, INTERCOM_CLEANING = #{intercomCleaning}, FLOAR_CLEANING = #{floarCleaning}, GARBAGECAN_CLEANING = #{garbagecanCleaning}, GLASS_CLEAN_CONFIRM = #{glassCleanConfirm}, PORTFOLIO_PAPER = #{portfolioPaper}, JRNL_PAPER = #{jrnlPaper}, BNKB_RIBBON = #{bnkbRibbon}, NOTICEGUIDE = #{noticeguide}, ETC_NOTICE = #{etcNotice}, INTERCOM = #{intercom}, DVR = #{dvr}, FLUORESCENT_LIGHT = #{fluorescentLight}, COOLER = #{cooler}, HEATER = #{heater}, BOOTH_OVERHAUL = #{boothOverhaul}, CHECK_RESIDUAL_QUANTITY = #{checkResidualQuantity}, RTRVL_BOX = #{rtrvlBox}, BILLBOARD_LIGHTING = #{billboardLighting}, UNUSL = #{unusl}, REPORT_EMP = #{reportEmp}, OFFICE_NAME = #{officeName}, TAKE_PHOTO_ENABLE = #{takePhotoEnable} WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, OVERHAUL_DATE = #{overhaulDate}

INSERT INTO ATMS_05001110 ( JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, OVERHAUL_DATE, CORNER_NAME, TERMINAL_INSIDE_CLEANING, TERMINAL_CLEANING, INTERCOM_CLEANING, FLOAR_CLEANING, GARBAGECAN_CLEANING, GLASS_CLEAN_CONFIRM, PORTFOLIO_PAPER, JRNL_PAPER, BNKB_RIBBON, NOTICEGUIDE, ETC_NOTICE, INTERCOM, DVR, FLUORESCENT_LIGHT, COOLER, HEATER, BOOTH_OVERHAUL, CHECK_RESIDUAL_QUANTITY, RTRVL_BOX, BILLBOARD_LIGHTING, UNUSL, REPORT_EMP, OFFICE_NAME, TAKE_PHOTO_ENABLE ) VALUES ( #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{overhaulDate}, #{cornerName}, #{terminalInsideCleaning}, #{terminalCleaning}, #{intercomCleaning}, #{floarCleaning}, #{garbagecanCleaning}, #{glassCleanConfirm}, #{portfolioPaper}, #{jrnlPaper}, #{bnkbRibbon}, #{noticeguide}, #{etcNotice}, #{intercom}, #{dvr}, #{fluorescentLight}, #{cooler}, #{heater}, #{boothOverhaul}, #{checkResidualQuantity}, #{rtrvlBox}, #{billboardLighting}, #{unusl}, #{reportEmp}, #{officeName}, #{takePhotoEnable} )
